name: Merge Duck
description:
Merge, evolve, and explore! Collect all 120 super powerful ducks!
Choose the best strategy to build the perfect duck squad!


• Collect and Raise Ducks
There are 120 ducks with their own unique abilities waiting for you to collect them.
Raise your ducks and use them to fight. Some are skilled in attack, while others will aid you in defense.

• Strategize
Increase your production and battle abilities. There are many different upgrades to choose from.
Select the best path to evolve your duck warriors.

• Idle Gameplay
Your duck warriors can fight automatically. You can collect profits even while you are offline.
Put down your phone and get a cup of coffee, all while your ducks collect the spoils of war for you.

• Casual Fun
Your ducks will come in a variety of silly outfits.
The game features a humorous story full of ducky antics.
What are these ducks going to get up to next?

Infinity merging and infinity evolution! Let your ducks protect their homeland!

*****************
After subscription, you will get the following benefits: 200% Gold production; Auto-Battle; Incubation Lab costs are reduced 25%; Quick Merge; 20 Diamonds every day.
Subscription notes:
- Now you can subscribe the VIP for All-Access to premium features
- Subscriptions are from USD $0.99 weekly and USD $2.99 monthly *
- Subscription automatically renews for the same price and duration period as the original "WEEKLY"/"MONTHLY" package unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period at the cost of the chosen package (weekly or monthly package)
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's iTunes Account Settings after purchase
- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period
